name: Before Midnight (The First Puzzle)
description:
Story

You are Mark Stevens, a college student living out a normal life. One night you receive an email from a friend prompting you to check out a mysterious page put up anonymously on SocialLeaf. After clicking you find out a mysterious group known as Azure are recruiting members by having them solve a puzzle. But watch your time, you only have until midnight to complete it.

Features

  • 3 stages of difficulty (Relax, Normal, Expert)
  • 3 different endings
  • Uncover the secret of Azure as you use programs on your computer to decode their messages.
